description: A volcanic islet of the Phlegraean Islands archipelago, Nesis was in antiquity the site of many elite seaside villas.
details:
The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Nisida

Porto Paone on the isle of Nisida is believed to be Odysseus' port of the Cyclops, but two other possibilities are the islands of Marettimo and Faraglioni.

properties.title: OSM location of Isola di Nisida
